text: "If you are that famous and you put all your jewelry on the net, you go to hotels where nobody can come near to the room," he said. "You cannot display your wealth and then be surprised that some people want to share it with you."
title: Kim Kardashian blames herself for Paris robbery, doesn’t want Kanye West to replace her $4.5M ring

meta_data.description: Kim Kardashian is blaming herself for the Paris robbery that stripped her of $10 million worth of jewels.
